messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: Sometimes bridges fall down and we do not know why. Engineers have to do a complete study to understand the reason. Sometimes, this happens because people used bad material to build the bridge. Or it happens because an important part of the bridge had a problem. In other cases, the bridge was made to hold a certain amount of weight. It could not hold more weight than that.

metadata.feedback_text: The text fails on two counts. First, the word 'Engineers' is B1 level, a clear violation of the A2 vocabulary rule. A simpler phrase like 'people who build bridges' is required. Second, the sentence 'the bridge was made to hold a certain amount of weight' uses the passive voice. A2 texts must use simple, active sentence structures. These errors make the text unacceptable.

Sometimes, this happens because people built the bridge with bad material. Or it happens because an important part of the bridge had a problem. In other cases, the bridge could only hold a certain amount of weight. It could not hold more weight than that.
